items.content_html: RSCS is a lightweight, easy-to-use cookie consent management solution for your web projects. It's designed to be flexible, customizable, and compliant with GDPR and other cookie regulations.
items.title: francescomugnai/RSCS-Really-Simple-Cookie-Solution: RSCS is a lightweight, easy-to-use cookie consent management solution for your web projects.  It's designed to be flexible, customizable, and compliant with GDPR and other cookie regulations.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)
